org.threadly.concurrent.lock

Interface LockFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NativeLockFactory, PriorityScheduledExecutor, PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker, TestableLockFactory, TestablePriorityScheduler

    public interface LockFactory
    Factory that can be injected to produce locks that make sense for a given thread pool.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isNativeLockFactory()
      Call to check if the lock factory produces blocking native locks.
      VirtualLock makeLock()
      Produces a new lock.

    • Method Detail

      • makeLock

        VirtualLock makeLock()
        Produces a new lock.
        Returns:
        new VirtualLock

      • isNativeLockFactory

        boolean isNativeLockFactory()
        Call to check if the lock factory produces blocking native locks. Or if it defaults to a test implementation.
        Returns:
        true if the factory builds native/blocking locks
